data.name: WSB GME
data.detailed_description:
WSB GME

pits players against each other in a small world where players must fight to be the last player standing.

Unleash on other players in battle royale mode where its every man for themselves. Get to the guns and health first to outwit your opponents in this small world until you remain the victor by outliving everyone else.

Loot. Kill. Survive.

  • Players can start a lobby of there own or join one of WSB GME official servers.
  • Players can play BattleRoyale mode via other players.
  • In Battleroyale: Players main goal is to out survive the other players.

2/2/22 - As we have incorporate a new dev team expect new updates to the game play above as well as graphical updates.

data.short_description: Unleash on other players in battle royale mode where its every man for themselves. Get to the guns and health first to outwit your opponents in this small world until you remain the victor by most kills. Loot. Kill. Survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 27 GB available space

data.legal_notice: We Support The Right To Perma Ban Any Player Found Cheating On Our Official Servers.
